meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an amethyst.
meanings.sent1: The amethystine gem sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had an amethystine hue that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The amethystine sky at dusk painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The amethystine glow of the sunset bathed the landscape in a purple light.
meanings.sent5: The amethystine flowers in the garden added a touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: Having a purple or violet color like that of an amethyst.
meanings.sent1: The artist used an amethystine shade to paint the flowers.
meanings.sent2: The amethystine curtains gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent3: The amethystine cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her amethystine scarf stood out in the crowd of black coats.
meanings.sent5: The amethystine waves of the ocean crashed against the shore.
